replies.msg:
2. 我係7月26親身去HKU Main Block Office交宣誓咗嘅影印本落Supporting Documents 個Box。然後7月29嘅收到email

Title係”The University of Hong Kong - Acknowledgement of Receipt of Package”


3. 係未收到confirm offer email 之前，我係8月2嘅收到我所屬Faculty 嘅orientation schedule email Title係”我個Course name - Mandatory orientation activities and registration arrangement 2019” **哩封應該同大家唔同 唔係Mass Mail** 但重點係我conditional offer 係收到哩封野果陣未confirm


同日隔多5個鐘後先收到Confirm Offer email, Title係”Confirmation: HKU - Submission of Official Document(s) - 我嘅Application Number (Course Code)



4.然後係8月5號收到Reg Day details,
title 係”[HKU] Registration Guideline”。
係叫我8月8 Reg Day 同要帶相填好form整學生證。


5. 然後我等到今日(7/8/2019)18:00都冇Portal Email，但聽日就Reg Day。所以我18:09 through ienroll個form email 同佢地講。冇打電話。冇人reply過我嘅enquiry，但係岩岩嘅23:02收到Portal Email
Title “Registration for New Full-time Undergraduate Students”
拉落最底就搵到portal acc登入搞online registration
咁癲23:02先出
